mapper.select: select * from goods order by gdsNum asc
select g.* ,c1.cateName, c2.cateName as top_cateName from category c1, category c2, goods g where c1.cateCodeRef = c2.cateCode and g.catecode = c1.cateCode and g.gdsNum = #{gdsNum}
mapper.update: update goods set gdsName = #{gdsName}, gdsStock = #{gdsStock}, gdsPrice = #{gdsPrice}, gdsDes = #{gdsDes}, gdsImg = #{gdsImg}, gdsThumbImg = #{gdsThumbImg} where gdsNum = #{gdsNum}
mapper.select: select * from orders order by orderdate desc

select o.orderId, o.userId, o.orderRec, o.Addr1, o.Addr2, o.Addr3, o.orderPhone, o.amount, o.orderDate, o.status, d.orderDetailsNum, d.gdsNum, d.cartStock, g.gdsName, g.gdsThumbImg, g.gdsPrice from orders o inner join orders_detail d on o.orderId = d.orderId inner join goods g on d.gdsNum = g.gdsNum where o.orderId = #{orderId}
